main event: A farmer in Maplewood, Ohio observed a large silver sphere that arose from behind the woods and disintegrated in mid-air on 29 August 1949.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 0530 in the morning., The object appeared to unravel a silver substance that floated earthward., The witness seemed very conscientious and sincere when recounting the event., The object was observed for an undisclosed length of time before it disintegrated., There is speculation that the object could have been a weather balloon in the process of disintegration.
